body:
Even with 4GB of memory (even though userspace to Plan 9 might only get 2GB), I get:

```
Error: writing tarball to buildlet: 500 Internal Server Error; body:
open /tmp/buildlet-scatch257490362/test/fixedbugs/bug316.go:
  '/tmp/buildlet-scatch257490362/test/fixedbugs/bug316.go' no free ram resources
```

There should only be 250 MB of total input + build output of files.  Why are we hitting RAM limits?
